name: THX Music Tracker Module
summary: Learn about .THX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: For legal reasons, the THX application was renamed to .AHX (Abyss' Highest eXperience). At the same time, the THX format was renamed to the AXH format.

description: A THX file is an audio file created by the THX music tracker, which was available for the Commodore Amiga. It contains synthesized music. THX files are similar to .MIDI files but can also include audio samples.

instructions: You can open a THX file with Cloanto Amiga Forever (multiplatform), Audio Overload (multiplatform), WinAHX (Windows), CocoModX (Mac), or UADE (Linux).
